name: Heart and Home
description:
You are an individual of an age (Somewhere between being able to drive and taking out a second mortgage) who pulls up to a despicable house, with all the intention in the world to destroy it. Your journey begins from the path leading to the house. What will you find inside? Who will you meet? Only time will tell...

This game was created for a game design class and was completed over the course of a couple months. There were no specific themes or goals for the game.

What is Bitsy?
Bitsy is a web-based game making software that runs directly in your browser. It was made and developed by adam (found here)

Specifically our game was made using a fork by AurySystem that can be found here
We used a combination of bitsy3d by aloelazoe and bitsy color by AurySystem.
Thanks to all of them for the work on the bitsy engine.

NOTE:
If you ever aren't sure what to do, try talking with the NPCS around the house. They might provide helpful hints to help progress the story.

We hope you enjoy the game. ^~^
